summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mixed on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 16
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Thursday, with eight gaining and the other 11 declining.
Bitcoin rose 1.6% to $24,477 by market close.
